rows.label: qst701604_msg0001
rows.name:
Ladies and gentlemen, I believe
it's officially time to begin the
Great Iiran Cook-Off!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0002
rows.name:
Please welcome our four contestants,
each of whom has honored us with
their culinary talents today!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0003
rows.name:
From the ever friendly Café Amicus,
we have Ms. Sorrel!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0004
rows.name:
Secondly, introducing the owner of
this very inn, Fred!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0005
rows.name:
Fred has been gracious enough to
provide us with the venue for today's
event. Thank you, Fred!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0006
rows.name:
Next up, it's the Paragon of Iira
himself, Shin!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0007
rows.name:
And last but not least, against
everyone's better judgment...
It's the Grail herself, Hikari!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0008
rows.name:
Now, the four of you will be competing
amongst each other.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0009
rows.name:
And to gauge your performance,
here are our esteemed judges!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0010
rows.name:
Hailing from the arid plains of Superbia, please give a welcome
to Emperor Hugo El Superbia!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0011
rows.name:
From that same yonder land comes a
scholar and connoisseur of fine food,
Mr. Maulton!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0012
rows.name:
Our resident gourmet, known far and
wide for her gastronomic gallantry,
Morimori!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0013
rows.name:
Representing our younger age
group, it's the dastardly duo...
Satahiko and Milt!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0014
rows.name:
And finally, I, Adel Olgo, might
even add a comment or two if I feel
like it.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0015
rows.name:
Judges, be sure not to let any
personal bias color your judgment.
Trust only your tongues!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0016
rows.name:
I know. I intend to remain completely
impartial.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0017
rows.name:
These are dark days, but that doesn't
mean we have to while our lives away
in misery.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0018
rows.name: Relax and enjoy the show!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0101
rows.name: Ms. Sorrel, would you care to go first?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0102
rows.name: Certainly.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0103
rows.name:
I've prepared Café Amicus's
world-famous five-star offering...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0104
rows.name: It's Tricolor Acqua Pazza.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0105
rows.name: Tricolor, you say?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0106
rows.name:
It looks like three things put
together... Isn't that cheating...?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0107
rows.name: This is the famous specialty, is it?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0108
rows.name:
I'm afraid it's been a while since
I last made it, so it might not be up to
scratch but, well...see what you think.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0032
rows.name: Change scene with short fade-out

rows.label: qst701604_msg0109
rows.name:
For starters, meal gets points for
ample serving. Could become regular
after this!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0110
rows.name:
The delicate notes of all three flavors
mingle in perfect harmony. You'd never
find the likes in Superbia!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0111
rows.name: It is exceedingly tasty.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0112
rows.name: ...I'm gonna leave the leaves.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0113
rows.name:
It musta been proper hard work to
prepare all three meals from scratch.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0114
rows.name:
Yes, we mustn't overlook the effort
that was put in to make this feast look
so attractive. A boon to Iira, indeed!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0201
rows.name:
Fred, if you'd like to present
your dish...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0202
rows.name:
I don't know how I can follow up that
enormous helping, but here we are...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0203
rows.name:
This is the most expensive thing we
have on the menu. Hope you like it!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0204
rows.name: What have we here?!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0205
rows.name: Meat! Woo-hoo!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0206
rows.name: Pretty straightforward...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0207
rows.name: Go on, tuck in!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0208
rows.name:
Roasted to the perfect degree. You'd
never find the likes in Superbia!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0209
rows.name: I like it. Very palatable.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0210
rows.name:
Mmm-mm! I didn't know meat could
be so soft and juicy!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0211
rows.name: ...It's decent.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0212
rows.name:
Is exceptionally tasty, true, but
cannot help feeling anyone could make
if to be using high quality meat.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0213
rows.name:
It's a little on the spicy side. Which
isn't a bad thing at all.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0301
rows.name:
OK Shin you're up. What have you got
for us?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0302
rows.name:
Well Laura? Which one are we going
to present?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0303
rows.name: Uhm, let me see...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0304
rows.name: Which dish will you present?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0305
rows.name: Fried Tartari a la Jin

rows.label: qst701604_msg0306
rows.name: Wingberry Cake

rows.label: qst701604_msg0311
rows.name: Let's go with the Tartari!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0312
rows.name: As you wish.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0313
rows.name:
Today, I've prepared for you my
special Pan-Fried Tartari.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0314
rows.name: More meat!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0315
rows.name: Why, that's my favorite!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0317
rows.name: It's delicious! I can't fault a thing!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0318
rows.name:
Plenty to fill tum-tum! Morimori always
give high rating for sizable portion.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0319
rows.name:
It's so juicy and tender... You'd never
find the likes in Superbia!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0320
rows.name:
I like meat, but this might be a little
too much for me...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0321
rows.name: It sits heavy on the stomach, I fear...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0322
rows.name: ...S'alright.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0351
rows.name: Let's go for the Wingberry Cake!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0352
rows.name: Got it.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0353
rows.name: Today, I've made Wingberry Cake.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0354
rows.name:
You look like tough muscle-man,
but make surprisingly girly dish.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0355
rows.name:
I must say, I never expected this
from you Shin!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0356
rows.name:
I can only assume he intended to
catch us by surprise.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0357
rows.name:
Is cute, scrummy...
Morimori cannot get enough of it!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0358
rows.name:
It's been so delicately crafted...
You'd never find the likes in Superbia!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0359
rows.name:
It's a welcome change from all the
meat.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0360
rows.name:
It's not too sweet, either. Just right
in my book.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0361
rows.name:
It's like my tummy is being filled
with happiness...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0362
rows.name: ...Got any more Cranberry Bells?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0401
rows.name: And finally, Hikari.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0402
rows.name:
Hoping to wow us all with your dish,
are you?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0403
rows.name: That's the idea.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0404
rows.name:
Nice one, putting me in at the end.
Don't think I didn't notice.
Saving the best for last, am I right?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0405
rows.name:
Actually, I just wanted everyone to
have a chance to enjoy their last meals
before the inevitable happened...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0406
rows.name: Hmph. Whatever...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0407
rows.name:
OK, are you ready?
Feast your eyes on THIS!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0408
rows.name: Well.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0409
rows.name: Urk!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0410
rows.name: It's a surprise, I'll give you that...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0411
rows.name: Yeurrggh!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0412
rows.name:
It's...definitely the one that's left
the biggest impression on me...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0413
rows.name:
Is afraid Morimori cannot stomach
another bite...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0414
rows.name:
Actually, I think with a bit of chewing,
it's definitely leaning towards edible.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0415
rows.name: It's a very particular flavor...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0416
rows.name:
Yes, I could get used to this! You'd
never find the likes in Superbia!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0417
rows.name:
Are Superbian tastebuds broken
or something...?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0501
rows.name:
Well, folks, we've sampled all four
meals, and the judges have come to
a verdict.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0502
rows.name:
I'd now like to announce the winner
of the Great Iiran Cook-Off...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0503
rows.name: Ohh, I'm on the edge of my seat...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0504
rows.name: Come on, come on...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0506
rows.name:
The grand prize of today's
tournament goes to...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0601
rows.name: Ms. Sorrel's Tricolor Acqua Pazza!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0602
rows.name: I'm honored!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0603
rows.name:
You are truly the finest cook that
Iira has to offer, lass.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0604
rows.name:
Not many people able to pull off three-
meal combo on one plate like that!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0605
rows.name:
I know it hasn't been easy for you,
but I'd be so chuffed if you could just
keep cooking like you did today!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0606
rows.name:
Thank you, Maulton-san. I feel I would
not have been able to start looking to
the future again were it not for you.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0607
rows.name:
Perhaps to reward my efforts, you
would be willing to part with your
closely-guarded recipe?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0608
rows.name: That, I'm afraid, is non-negotiable.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0609
rows.name: Hey, Adel.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0610
rows.name:
What's the deal?
Why didn't my dish win?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0611
rows.name: Ah, well...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0612
rows.name:
I believe the problem was simply
that your meal was aimed at too
discerning a palate, Hikari.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0613
rows.name:
You mean I should have toned
it down?!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0614
rows.name: Hard luck Shin.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0615
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0616
rows.name:
But I've never done something like
that before. It was interesting.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0617
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0618
rows.name:
Like Adel said, the point was for
us to have a good time.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0619
rows.name:
Yes, and I had a wonderful time!
My heart was racing when they
were announcing the winner!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0620
rows.name: All in all, it was pretty good.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0701
rows.name: Shin's Wingberry Cake

rows.label: qst701604_msg0702
rows.name: Go team!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0703
rows.name: We did it!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0704
rows.name:
Was very refreshing interlude that
came just at right time, especially
after series of heavy dishes.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0705
rows.name:
Yes, it could not have been more
well-timed.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0706
rows.name:
And placed in contrast to Hikari's...
highly combustible concoction...
that came right after...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0707
rows.name:
It instantly became the highlight of
the event with its exquisite flavor.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0708
rows.name:
Wait, let me get this straight... You're
saying my dish somehow highlighted
the flavor of the other one?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0709
rows.name: In a nutshell, yes.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0710
rows.name:
Looks like you owe me one Shin.
Just hit me up if you wanna go
halves on the reward.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0711
rows.name: Good call Laura.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0712
rows.name:
Hey, it was your cooking skills that
landed us the win!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0713
rows.name:
Kasumi's advice also was
a big help.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0714
rows.name: I'm glad to have been of service.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0801
rows.name:
And that brings us to the end of the
contest.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0802
rows.name:
But never fear, folks - with your
support, I'd like to host a second one
someday, so keep polishing those skills!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0803
rows.name:
Perhaps we should switch it up next
time round. I'd gladly cook something
up for a change!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0804
rows.name:
Morimori quite happy to remain as
judge...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0805
rows.name:
I'm not complaining. Just as long as
you make sure to hold 'em here!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0806
rows.name:
We'll do even better next time
won't we Shin?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0807
rows.name: For sure.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0808
rows.name:
And I'll have to make sure to get
back into my usual rhythm!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0809
rows.name: Next time, that first prize is SO mine!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0810
rows.name: Please, just...don't.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0811
rows.name:
The only way she could win is if
she's the only one left standing...
